name: Check Celestial Energy
description: Concentrate on your Star Pearl to check the amount of Celestial Energy stored inside.

name: Meditate
description: Focus your mind on gathering Celestial Energy from the hevens and stars above.

name: Purify
description: Purify the area around yourself cleansing all corpses in the process. Grants a small amount of Celestial Energy for every purified corpse.
message: You begin purifying the area around yourself.

name: Rite of Faith
description: When another individual places their trust in you. The essence of that faith can be harnessed and converted into Celestial Energy using this spell.
